name: Manus-Bond Flex-Weld 15 Non-Sag
description: Manus-Bond Flex-Weld 15 Non-Sag is an all-purpose, modified epoxy that provides excellent tensile, peel and shear strength. It will hold vertical beads up to ½”, exhibits superior adhesion and flexibility to a wide variety of substrates including: ceramics, concrete, wood, composites, FRP and most metals-without the use of a primer. Flex-Weld has a user-friendly and forgiving 1:1 by volume mix ratio. Light stable and highly UV resistant. Flex-Weld outperforms most “brittle” 2-component systems by retaining high peel strength and flexibility through a wide temperature range.
